get.summary: Gets the avatar bundles that are displayed at signup

post.summary: Endpoint for signing up a new user

400.description:
Bad request
1: The request was empty.

403.description:
0: Token Validation Failed
2: Captcha Failed.
10: Invalid Birthdate.
11: Invalid Username.
12: Username already taken.
13: Invalid Password.
14: Password and Username are same.
15: Password is too simple.
16: Bundle id is not valid for sign up.
25: Too many attempts. Please wait a bit.

post.summary: Create a new verified signup challenge

400.description:
1: The request is empty.
3: The delivery method is not supported.
4: The delivery target is invalid.
5: The email address is invalid.
6: The phone number is invalid.

403.description:
0: Token Validation Failed
7: The email address is already linked to the maximum number of users.
8: The phone number is already linked to a user.

429.description:
2: Too many attempts. Please wait a bit.
18: Captcha must be passed before signing up.

post.summary: Endpoint for signing up a new verified user

400.description:
Bad request
1: The request was empty.

403.description:
0: Token Validation Failed
2: Captcha Failed.
10: Invalid Birthdate.
11: Invalid Username.
12: Username already taken.
13: Invalid Password.
14: Password and Username are same.
15: Password is too simple.
16: Bundle id is not valid for sign up.
20: The voucher is invalid.
21: The voucher has expired.
22: The phone number is invalid.
23: The phone number is already linked to a user.
24: The email address is already linked to the maximum number of users.
25: Too many attempts. Please wait a bit.

post.summary: Create a new verified signup voucher

400.description:
1: The request is empty.
9: The challenge is invalid.
11: The code is invalid.

403.description:
0: Token Validation Failed
10: The challenge has expired.

429.description: 2: Too many attempts. Please wait a bit.

post.summary: Authenticates as a user given a two step verification verification token.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user ID to authenticate as.

400.description:
1: User is invalid.
5: Invalid two step verification ticket.
10: Invalid verification token.

Roblox.Authentication.Api.Models.SignupR.description: A response model for the Signup endpoint

starterPlaceId.description: The id of the game to start with

Roblox.Authentication.Api.Models.SignupB.description: The response model for the bundles needed for signup

Roblox.Authentication.Api.Models.BundleR.description: Api response model to represent a bundle

userOutfitId.description: The asset IDs that are associated with the bundle

Roblox.Authentication.Api.TwoStepVerific.description: Request parameters for logging in via two step verification.

challengeId.description: The two step verification challenge Id.

verificationToken.description: The two step verification verification token.

rememberDevice.description: Whether or not two step verification should be required from this device for the next 30 days.

Response for successfully creating a challenge
